title: FitBunny
description: Full-stack fitness tracking app built with Rust (Actix) and Svelte, using JWT auth with Supabase integration.

title: alexandermeade.dev
description: The current website you're viewing built with svelte and tailwind, deployed on vercel.

title: 3D Renderer
description: A 3D renderer I built using only SDL2 functions, which don't supply 3D capabilities.

title: Lunova
description: Experimental transpiler from Lunova language to Lua, written in C#.

title: Snakes and Bits
description: An esoteric programming language built from the ground up using Rust with the Crossterm package. Inspired by the game Snakes and paired with a CLI tool that allows easy execution on all platforms.

title: FNAF Curtains Drawn
description: A fan game built from the ground up in Rust using Tokio for async, Ratatui for terminal UI, and Rodio for audio.
